name: react-typescript
description: boilerplate with tsc and not bundling

scripts.setup: npm install && cd build && npm install
scripts.clean: cd build && mv package.json node_modules && find . -mindepth 1 -name node_modules -prune -o -exec rm -rf {} + && mv node_modules/package.json .
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run cp:css &&  npm run cp:sc && npm run cp:html && npm run tsc && npm run mnf && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run lite"
